Compatible with iOS 11 and 12

A complete dark mode for Chrome. Makes all of the Chrome UI dark and comes with multiple color schemes to choose from. Also (optionally) changes the design of the toolbar when in incognito to distinguish the incognito UI from the main UI. Supports iOS 11.2-12.1.2 (unconfirmed below iOS 11.2).

Configure options from Settings.

Fixed visual issues caused by latest Chrome update Properly darkened tabs on iPad Fixed crash when closing Chrome (credits to imkpatil) Added a new preference bundle icon (credits to mogui666) Fixed & darkened the autofill bar above the keyboard (appears when filling web forms)
Added option to make the keyboard background opaque
Added arm64e support
Fixed graphical bug caused by the latest Chrome update
Fix elusive startup crash (finally)
Fix titles not appearing above tabs in the tab switcher
Performance improvements in the tab switcher and new tab page
Misc. bugfixes, performance improvements, and cleanup
Darkened the keyboard within webviews
Darkened the find-in-page UI
Darkened the overscroll UI
Fixed known startup crashes
Fixed various visual bugs and fine-tuned UI elements
